name: the cat burglar 2: cortex strikes back
name_original: the cat burglar 2: cortex strikes back
description:
your still a cat. steal some gems 😈

  • Arrows keys: move.
  • Up arrow or X: jump.
  • M: open/close the menu. With the menu open, use up/down to highlight an item, and press X to select it. If prompted, press Y to confirm.

Created in 72 hours for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-127-cats

The limitation for the Mini Jam was to use the color palette from the jam's banner gif. Enabling "palette swaps" in the menu will use different palettes for different areas of the map, based on the colors from previous Mini Jams.
